Fraudsters posing as Spark staff fleece pensioner for $40k after hacking his computer and iPhone, stealing identity https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/fraudsters-spoke-as-spark-staff-fleece-pensioner-for-40k-after-hacking-his-computer-and-iphone-stealing-identity/QZEIN3WLIVHKRL6RHYLRMF5RRM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/fraudsters-spoke-as-spark-staff-fleece-pensioner-for-40k-after-hacking-his-computer-and-iphone-stealing-identity/QZEIN3WLIVHKRL6RHYLRMF5RRM/ Lane NicholsThe scammer spoke to the pensioner by phone for three hours while controlling his devices. Thu, 05 Sep 2024 06:25:58 +0000 Scammers hacked into the elderly man's computer and iPhone, stole his passwords and identity, then siphoned $40,000 from his account while stringing him on by phone for three hours.
